q: At a dinner this week, attended by "The Daily Telegraph", with conservatives in New York, Donald Rumsfeld elicited murmurs of approval when he suggested that Barack Obama 's troop-heavy strategy in Afghanistan was flawed. I personally did not think we needed to make a career out of Afghanistan, he said. "The Soviets were in there with hundreds of thousands of troops for 12 years and lost. It's a landlocked country, it went through occupation, civil war, drought, hostile neighbours.

Once again, it seems absurd that this amount of criticism is being leveled at Ricky Gervais : Has Judd Apatow never seen an episode of Saturday Night Live?
